description: This sub-path controls the order of things, the concept of the ending of life

spells.name: Autopsy
spells.effect: Effect: Determines the exact cause and time of death.  This spell does not reveal guilt, only the cause of death.  The level of the spell determines if a corpse can be targeted by this spell based on the approximate time since death.

spells.name: Resistance to Death
spells.effect: Effect: This spell protects against any effect that may cause death automatically, giving a bonus to checks to resist such effects.

initialGrade.effect: +20 to All Resistances Vs Death effects.

intermediateGrade.effect: +40 to All Resistances Vs Death effects.

advancedGrade.effect: +60 to All Resistances Vs Death effects.

arcaneGrade.effect: +80 to All Resistances Vs Death effects.

spells.name: Minor Extermination
spells.effect: Kill all the creatures with Presence 20 or below targeted by the caster if they fail their MR check.

spells.name: Kiss of Death
spells.effect: Effect: This spell finishes off someone who is about to die. The target should be at the state between life and death, Unless they pass their MR test they will die.

spells.name: Final Resting Place
spells.effect: Effect: This spell automatically destroys all undead creatures without a soul in therange of the spell. Creatures can resist its effects by overcoming the MR determined by the level of the spell.

spells.name: Feeling Death
spells.effect: Caster is able to sense death nearby, noticing if someone has died or is dying around him.

initialGrade.effect: Caster notices if someone died in an area of ​​about 100m/109yd radius for less than an hour or if there is someone dying, or going to die in the next minute.

intermediateGrade.effect: Caster notices if someone has died in a radius of 150m/164yd in the last six hours or if someone close to him will die in the next ten minutes.  The death sensed by this ability may not be for certain; it is more of an intuition as the death could be prevented.

advancedGrade.effect: The pitcher clearly feels death. The mage can sense if someone has died regardless of how much time has passed, or looking at someone determine how much longer they have to live and a vague idea how they will die.

arcaneGrade.effect: As advanced degree, except the caster can determine the probable cause of death of those in the past as well as those in the near future.

spells.name: Memento Mori
spells.effect: Effect: This spell will kill any creature within its area thatcan be considered a living being, regardless of their nature orcondition. Individuals may ignore their effects by passing the MR test.

spells.name: Deadly curse
spells.effect: The caster can make a person die at any time, in the method of his choosing.  It effectively allows the mage to seal the fate of the individual unless they pass a MR test.  All other individuals involved in the predetermined fate must pass the MR to avoid the same fate. (example: The mages sets the target to die in an airship crash, all other passengers would need to pass the MR to avoid death)

spells.name: Stop Death
spells.effect: Effect: The target of this spell becomes temporarily immortal. Does not mean that he becomes an undead, rather thatas long as the spell is active, then death shall have no power over him. This spell has no effect on powers that directly attack the soul.

initialGrade.effect: Ignores any automatic death effects, but still vulnerable to injury

intermediateGrade.effect: The character also becomes immune to injury; however should the caster suffer lethal levels of damage and not cure them before lapsing the spell he will die.  Criticals to vital areas can still result in death.

advancedGrade.effect: As in intermediate grade, but Criticals will not result in death

arcaneGrade.effect: As advanced degree, but the hit is immune to negative action that may suffer as a result of physical deterioration. (It looks like its intent it to remove all action penalties from Criticals)

spells.name: Death
spells.effect: The magician gets absolute power over death, and may decide who dies in the range of the spell at will as an automatic effect, the caster can choose any living being. Someone who exceeds the resistance check once can not be affected again by this power (launched by the same witch).
